entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39 with temperature rising to minus 36 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 39 with temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
